title: Xayah and Rakan (Champs + skins) Bundle Price?
body: Can anyone tell me the amount of RP it would cost for the bundle?

replies.body: They're still in testing and I'm not aware of any bundles.  Should anything come up, you'll want to bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for announcements.  Keep your eyes on that page in case of any sales or bundles come up!
